brief.brief: An interval that limits availability posting to the number of days of downtime.

detail.detail: When Incidents are closed, downtime may be posted to all affected configuration items. A failure of the server, therefore, will affect every configuration item in the network, a potentially enormous number.
The resources required to post availability are directly proportional to the number of days an outage was posted and the number of configuration items affected.
